backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing chatrooms, messages, reactions, user profiles, activity tracking, and role-based access control with storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two frontend ChatArea.tsx feature requirements with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing major frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and configuration.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app root and main script with mobile viewport settings.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with lobby and chatroom routes, shared layout, 404 handling, theme provider, and conditional footer.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog enabling avatar selection via upload or Giphy search with debounced queries, upload validation, and avatar update mutations.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat interface with collapsible header, message list with auto‑scrolling, reply handling, pinned video, and compact message/user count icons.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media previews (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter), live status, and thumbnail fetching logic.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Modal dialog for creating chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media upload or URL (YouTube, Twitch, Twitter) support.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with attribution and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app branding, username editing, avatar selection, and back navigation for chatrooms.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Placeholder component that renders nothing because the app uses no authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays individual chat messages with reactions, timestamps, media embedding, replies, and Twitter widget loading.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides a message composer with text, media uploads, video/Twitter URL validation, and optional voice recording.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video for a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: A React audio player component that manages playback, waveform visualization, timing updates, and UI styling for voice messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor via Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a configurable delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading stored identities and handling login/logout through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatrooms, messages, profiles, and reactions using the backend actor and local user metadata.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom CSS variables, theming, and layout defaults for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports API configuration constants for Giphy integration.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Utilities for formatting numbers using compact notation (k, M, B).
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Functions for searching and fetching trending GIFs from the Giphy API and mapping results to app-friendly objects.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty placeholder file for future html2canvas logic.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty placeholder file for future Twitter embed rendering code.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and parses Twitter oEmbed data with caching, deduped requests, and lightweight HTML extraction for text and images.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Implements localStorage-based caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with validation, versioning, and expiration.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail utilities.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty placeholder file for Twitter thumbnail caching.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Provides helpers to extract IDs and build thumbnails for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Loads a chatroom, handles loading/error states, increments view count, and renders the chat interface.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Displays and filters chatrooms with search, category filters, and creation dialog handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, plugins, and container settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s current state, including schema/version info, existing feature specs, a new feature request about chatroom header updates, and project metadata.
